was armed with a knife during this altercation. As a result of the attack,
the wife of the appellant has sustained a bleeding injury and has been
subsequently admitted to a hospital. The appellant has been arrested
and  taken  into  police  custody.  On  January  01,  2019,  Dr.  H  C  W
Ajithkumar  MO/Medico-Legal  Officer  has  examined  the  wife  of  the
appellant during her stay at the hospital and subsequently prepared a
medico-legal report. This report has been designated as exhibit “පැ-04”.
